Snowdrops are one of the plants that the player is tasked with growing in Queen Ellamaria's garden in the Garden of Tranquillity quest. Their seeds are obtained from Kragen after growing some cabbage for him in the northern Ardougne farming patch.

'''Snowdrops''' are one of the plants that the player is tasked with growing in [[Queen Ellamaria]]'s garden in the [[Garden of Tranquillity]] [[quest]]. Their [[snowdrop seed|seeds]] are obtained from [[Kragen]] after growing some [[cabbage]] for him in the northern [[Ardougne]] farming patch.
